message.easybuild.guide.line1: - Press 'P' to open the EasyBuild builder UI on the client.
message.easybuild.guide.line2: - Use the builder to browse schematics, change build modes, and manage material checks.
message.easybuild.guide.line3: - Watch the chat for material check and build job feedback while blocks are being placed.
message.easybuild.guide.line4: - Use the 'Select Chests' button in the builder to link containers, then press 'U' to finish the selection mode.
message.easybuild.guide.line5: - Hold ALT and scroll to shift the schematic anchor before starting a build.
easybuild.gui.title: EasyBuild Schematic Builder
easybuild.gui.chest_selection_tip: Chest selection active – containers will glow while you click them. Press 'U' to finish.
easybuild.gui.detail.name: Name: %s
easybuild.gui.materials.title: Material Requirements
easybuild.autobuild.disabled: [EasyBuild] Client auto-build is disabled in the configuration.
easybuild.chest_selection.started: [EasyBuild] Chest selection enabled – click container blocks to toggle them.
easybuild.chest_selection.not_container: [EasyBuild] That block is not a container.
easybuild.chest_selection.added: [EasyBuild] Added chest at %s, %s, %s to the selection.
easybuild.chest_selection.removed: [EasyBuild] Removed chest at %s, %s, %s from the selection.
